languages.text: "Надо соглашаться. Нюхом чую — надо соглашаться с этим добрым господином", {n}— псайкер посылает вам многозначительный взгляд.{/n}
"We should take him up on the offer. I can sense it — we should agree to this kind gentleman's proposal." {n}She gives you a meaningful look.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Надо соглашаться. Нюхом чую — надо соглашаться с этим добрым господином", {n}— псайкер посылает вам многозначительный взгляд.{/n}

"We should take him up on the offer. I can sense it — we should agree to this kind gentleman's proposal." {n}She gives you a meaningful look.{/n}

languages.text: “我们应该接受他的提议。我能感觉得到，我们应该同意这位善良的先生的提议。”{n}她意味深长地看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We should take him up on the offer. I can sense it — we should agree to this kind gentleman's proposal." {n}She gives you a meaningful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们应该接受他的提议。我能感觉得到，我们应该同意这位善良的先生的提议。”{n}她意味深长地看着你。{/n}

languages.text: «Deberíamos aceptar. Puedo sentirlo, deberíamos aceptar la propuesta de este amable caballero». {n}La mirada que te lanza está cargada de significado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We should take him up on the offer. I can sense it — we should agree to this kind gentleman's proposal." {n}She gives you a meaningful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Deberíamos aceptar. Puedo sentirlo, deberíamos aceptar la propuesta de este amable caballero». {n}La mirada que te lanza está cargada de significado.{/n}

languages.text: 「彼の申し出に応じるべきよ。こちらの親切な紳士の提案を飲むべきだって、あたいの勘が言ってるわ」{n}彼女は意味ありげにこちらを見てきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We should take him up on the offer. I can sense it — we should agree to this kind gentleman's proposal." {n}She gives you a meaningful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼の申し出に応じるべきよ。こちらの親切な紳士の提案を飲むべきだって、あたいの勘が言ってるわ」{n}彼女は意味ありげにこちらを見てきた。{/n}

languages.text: "Wir sollten sein Angebot annehmen. Ich spüre es – wir sollten den Vorschlag dieses freundlichen Herrn annehmen." {n}Sie wirft dir einen bedeutungsvollen Blick zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We should take him up on the offer. I can sense it — we should agree to this kind gentleman's proposal." {n}She gives you a meaningful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir sollten sein Angebot annehmen. Ich spüre es – wir sollten den Vorschlag dieses freundlichen Herrn annehmen." {n}Sie wirft dir einen bedeutungsvollen Blick zu.{/n}

languages.text: « Nous devrions accepter l'offre de cet aimable gentleman. Je le sens, » {n}conclut-elle en vous lançant un regard significatif.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We should take him up on the offer. I can sense it — we should agree to this kind gentleman's proposal." {n}She gives you a meaningful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous devrions accepter l'offre de cet aimable gentleman. Je le sens, » {n}conclut-elle en vous lançant un regard significatif.{/n}

languages.text: "Teklifini kabul etmeliyiz. Hissediyorum. Bu nazik beyefendinin suyuna gitmeliyiz." {n}Sana anlamlı bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We should take him up on the offer. I can sense it — we should agree to this kind gentleman's proposal." {n}She gives you a meaningful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Teklifini kabul etmeliyiz. Hissediyorum. Bu nazik beyefendinin teklifini kabul etmeliyiz." {n}Sana anlamlı bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
